Module se1.bestellsystem
Package application

Class Application_E1

java.lang.Object
application.Application_E1
public class Application_E1 extends Object
Runnable application class that creates and outputs simple orders using the datamodel. "se1.bestellsystem".
Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-F1"
Author:
"Yuetung Cheung"

    • process

      public <T, R> R process(R collector, Collection<T> collection, Consumer<T> applyEach)
      Generic method that converts a Collection<T> to Stream<T> and applies a function @{code applyEach} to each element.
      Type Parameters:
      T - generic Collection and Stream element type.
      R - generic return type of a collector.
      Parameters:
      collector - collector with result.
      collection - elements to be processed.
      applyEach - functional interface to process each element t.
      Returns:
      collector with result.

    • process

      public <T, R> R process(R collector, Collection<T> collection, Function<Stream<T>,Stream<T>> callout, Consumer<T> applyEach)
      Generic method that converts a Collection<T> to Stream<T>, allows a callout to be applied to the stream before a function @{code applyEach} is applied to each remaining element.
      Type Parameters:
      T - generic Collection and Stream element type.
      R - generic return type of a collector.
      Parameters:
      collector - collector with result.
      collection - elements to be processed.
      callout - functional interface to process stream of elements before processing function is applied.
      applyEach - functional interface to process each element t.
      Returns:
      collector with result.

    • printCustomer

      public StringBuffer printCustomer(StringBuffer sb, Customer c)
      Print attributes of one Customer object into StringBuffer as column-separated line. 
       Example:
 | 892474 | Meyer, Eric                    | eric98@yahoo.com, (030) 3945-642298          |
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuffer that will contains the formatted result. A new StringBuffer is created when sb is null.
      c - Customer object.
      Returns:
      StringBuffer that contains formatted result (same sb).

    • printCustomers

      public StringBuffer printCustomers(StringBuffer sb, Collection<Customer> customers)
      Print collection of Customer objects into StringBuffer as lines with Customer attributes. 
       Example:
 | 643270 | Bayer, Anne              | anne24@yahoo.de, (030) 3481-23352   |
 | 412396 | Blumenfeld, Nadine-Ulla  | +49 152-92454                       |
 | 892474 | Meyer, Eric              | eric98@yahoo.com, (030) 3945-642298 |
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuffer that will contains the formatted result. A new StringBuffer is created when sb is null.
      customers - collection of Customers (null argument is ignored).
      Returns:
      StringBuffer that contains formatted result (same sb).

    • printOrders

      public StringBuffer printOrders(StringBuffer sb, Collection<Order> orders)
      Print collection of Order objects into StringBuffer as lines with Order attributes. 
       Example:
 | 8592356245 | Meyer, Eric                | 4 items | created: 2022-05-16 08:16:42 |
 | 3563561357 | Bayer, Anne                | 2 items | created: 2022-05-16 08:16:42 |
 | 5234968294 | Meyer, Eric                | 1 items | created: 2022-05-16 08:16:42 |
 | 6135735635 | Blumenfeld, Nadine-Ulla    | 3 items | created: 2022-05-16 08:16:42 |
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuffer that will contains the formatted result. A new StringBuffer is created when sb is null.
      orders - collection of Orders (null argument is ignored).
      Returns:
      StringBuffer that contains formatted result (same sb).

    • printOrder

      public TablePrinter printOrder(TablePrinter orderTable, Order order)
      Print order into TablePrinter with order item separated lines. 
       Example:
 +----------+---------------------------------------------+--------------------+
 |Bestell-ID|Bestellungen                  MwSt      Preis|     MwSt     Gesamt|
 +----------+---------------------------------------------+--------------------+
 |8592036245|Eric's Bestellung                            |                    |
 |          | - 4 Teller, 4x 6.49          4.14     25.96â‚¬|                    |
 |          | - 8 Becher, 8x 1.49          1.90     11.92â‚¬|                    |
 |          | - 1 Buch "OOP"               5.23*    79.95â‚¬|                    |
 |          | - 4 Tasse, 4x 2.99           1.91     11.96â‚¬|   13.18â‚¬    129.79â‚¬|
 +----------+---------------------------------------------+--------------------+
      Parameters:
      orderTable - to print order into.
      order - order printed into orderTable, (null argument is ignored).
      Returns:
      TablePrinter that contains formatted result.

    • printOrders

      public TablePrinter printOrders(TablePrinter orderTable, Collection<Order> orders)
      Print collection of order objects into TablePrinter. 
       Example:
 +----------+---------------------------------------------+--------------------+
 |Bestell-ID|Bestellungen                  MwSt      Preis|     MwSt     Gesamt|
 +----------+---------------------------------------------+--------------------+
 |8592356245|Eric's Bestellung:                           |                    |
 |          | - 4 Teller, 4x 6.49          4.14     25.96â‚¬|                    |
 |          | - 8 Becher, 8x 1.49          1.90     11.92â‚¬|                    |
 |          | - 1 Buch "OOP"               5.23*    79.95â‚¬|                    |
 |          | - 4 Tasse, 4x 2.99           1.91     11.96â‚¬|   13.18â‚¬    129.79â‚¬|
 +----------+---------------------------------------------+--------------------+
 |3563561357|Anne's Bestellung:                           |                    |
 |          | - 2 Teller, 2x 6.49          2.07     12.98â‚¬|                    |
 |          | - 2 Tasse, 2x 2.99           0.95      5.98â‚¬|    3.02â‚¬     18.96â‚¬|
 +----------+---------------------------------------------+--------------------+
  >>>>>>>>>>                                       Gesamt:|   16.20â‚¬    148.75â‚¬|
                                                          +====================+
      Parameters:
      orderTable - to print orders into.
      orders - collection of orders printed into orderTable, (null argument is ignored).
      Returns:
      TablePrinter that contains formatted result.

    • getTaxRate

      public double getTaxRate(TAX taxRate)
      Get percent tax rate from enum value.
      Parameters:
      taxRate - enum value of applicable tax rate.
      Returns:
      tax rate in percent.

    • calculateIncludedVAT

      public long calculateIncludedVAT(long grossValue, TAX tax)
      Calculate included VAT tax from gross price/value based on specific tax rate (VAT is value-added tax, in Germany it is called "Mehrwertsteuer" (MwSt.)).
      Parameters:
      grossValue - value that included tax.
      tax - applicable tax rate.
      Returns:
      tax included in gross value based on tax rate.

    • calculateValueAndTax

      public long[] calculateValueAndTax(Order order)
      Calculate compounded value and VAT tax over all order items.
      Parameters:
      order - order to calculate compounded value and VAT tax.
      Returns:
      tuple with compounded value and VAT tax of order items.

    • fmtName

      public String fmtName(String firstName, String lastName, int... style)
      Format Customer name according to a style (0 is default): 
       style: 0: "Meyer, Eric"    10: "MEYER, ERIC"    20: "E.M."
        1: "Meyer, E."      11: "MEYER, E."      21: "E."
        2: "Eric Meyer"     12: "ERIC MEYER"     22: "M."
        3: "E. Meyer"       13: "E. MEYER"
        4: "Eric M."        14: "ERIC M."
        5: "Eric"           15: "ERIC"
        6: "Meyer"          16: "MEYER"
      Parameters:
      firstName - first name, may be null or "".
      lastName - last name, may be null or "".
      style - name formatting style.
      Returns:
      formatted name according to style.

    • fmtDate

      public String fmtDate(long datetime, int dateStyle, String fill, int... timeStyle)
      Format date/time from long value (64 bit, counted ms since 01/01/1970). Date and time styles can be combined, e.g. with dateStyle 4, fill: "at" and timeStyle 3 returning: "17-05-2022 at 18:55:43, CEST". 
       dateStyle:                          timeStyle:
     0: "2022-05-17 18:55:43" (*)        0: "18:55:43"
     1: "17-05-2022 18:55:43" (*)        1: "18:55"
     2: "1652823817740"       (*)        2: "18:55:43.348"
     3: "2022-05-17"                     3: "18:55:43, CEST"
     4: "17-05-2022"                     4: "18:55:43, +0200"
     5: "05/17/22"                       5: "06:55:43 PM"
     6: "05/17/2022"
     7: "May 17, 2022"
     8: "17.05.22"
     9: "17.05.2022"
    10: "17. Mai 2022"
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    11: "Di"
    12: "Dienstag"
    13: "Dienstag, der 17. Mai 2022"
    14: "Tue"
    15: "Tuesday"
    16: "Tue, May 05, 2022"
    (*) timeStyle option has no effect.
      Parameters:
      datetime - date/time 64 bit value, counted ms since 01/01/1970.
      dateStyle - date formatting style (0 is default).
      fill - String filled between date and time (space is default).
      timeStyle - time formatting style (0 is default).
      Returns:
      formatted date or time according to style.

    • fmtPrice

      public String fmtPrice(long price, int... style)
      Format long value to price according to a style (0 is default): 
       Example: long value: 499
 style: 0: "4.99"
        1: "4.99ï¿½"
        2: "4.99$"
        3: "4.99ï¿½"
        4:  "499ï¿½"
        5:  "499"
      Parameters:
      price - long value as price.
      style - price formatting style.
      Returns:
      formatted price according to style.

    • fmtDecimal

      public String fmtDecimal(long value, int decimalDigits, String... unit)
      Method to format a long value to a decimal String with a specified number of digits.
      Parameters:
      value - value to format to String in decimal format.
      decimalDigits - number of digits.
      unit - appended unit as String.
      Returns:
      formatted decimal value as String.
